para.text: During creation of the input files for a model (
) or at other times, ModelMuse may detect problems with the model. Error and warning messages about these problems are displayed in the
dialog box. The dialog box can be displayed by selecting
The dialog box is displayed automatically when new errors or warnings messages are generated. The messages can be copied to the clipboard by clicking the
button or saved to a text file by clicking the
button. The messages can be deleted by clicking the

In warning or error relating to a specific object, you can right-click on the error or warning and a pop-up menu will appear. You use the pop-up menu to select, edit or go to the object in question. You can select multiple objects but you can only edit or go to a single object.
